Prenatal Support
1
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, clita laoreet ne cum. His cu harum inermis iudicabit. Ex vidit fierent hendrerit eum, sed stet periculis ut.
Discuss and develop a birth plan to be communicated to your care providers
Provide emotional support to you and your partner
Provide tips for preparing for birth and referrals as needed
Provide educational resources about the different stages of labor, what to expect and how to move forward when labor has begun

Labor Support

Support with pain management techniques
Support with carrying out birth plan
Provide educational support about medical staff decisions
Provide emotional and physical support

Postpartem Support

Present up to 2 hours after birth
Support with first feeding
Provide basic in-person lactation support
Provide postpartum and lactation referrals if applicable
